ModMetaData.name: Magical Freezer
ModMetaData.author: Ysimir
ModMetaData.description: 5 magical temperatures thingies! CONTAINS: 1x Magical Cooler (fixed at 18C) 1x Magical Freezer (fixed at -10C) 1x Magical Campfire (fixed at 21C) 1x Magical HELLFIRE FROM HELL AND FIRE (fixed at 500C). 1x AlmostMagical Freezer (fixed at -10C, consumes wood at a 10% rate)
